TopicTitle: Have we seen Jeb in any of the KSP 2 footage?

Articles.Content: I was wondering if Jeb was in any of the footage from the game yet, I don't remember seeing him. If someone knows where could you send a screenshot? And if a developer is reading this we need Jebediah Kerman.
If a developer is reading this it would be fantastic if we could have an option for exactly zero famous kerbals to show up in a save.
He's been mentioned a lot and I'm pretty sure we've already seen some of the other "big 5" scattered about footage, so He's in there for sure (and it would be heresy if he wasn't).
Which Kerbal starred in TikBarf videos?
